name: Kohactive
tagline: Custom Software, Mobile and Web Apps
description:
Kohactive is a custom software design and development firm with over 10 years of experience building business-critical web and mobile products. Since 2008, we've partnered with startups, non-profits, and enterprise organizations across the country to build transformative digital products.
 
Our partners trust Kohactive to deliver innovative solutions that drive their business forward. We work collaboratively with our clients with a unified goal of maximizing the value that we can create for their businesses.
We've helped hundreds of startups, businesses, and enterprises launch over 250 digital products. Successful projects are more than just design and technology – it's about the people: our clients, their customers, and our team. Through a shared vision and mission, we help our partners solve their toughest challenges.
 
We prefer to be your partner, not your vendor. We’re not here just to sell your our services – we want to become part of your team. We believe a small team, acting together, can accomplish incredible things. We'll align ourselves with your vision and mission and help you build the custom software that can transform your organization. We prefer small teams, open conversations, and a shared sense of purpose.
READ MORE...
